sql.default: select user_key, user_name, user_id, created_at, created_by, is_archived_flag from user where condition = 'your condition'
select user_key, user_name, user_id, created_at, created_by, is_archived_flag from user
update user set update_data = 'your data' where condition = 'your condition'
insert into user (user_key, user_name, user_id, created_at, created_by, is_archived_flag) values ('your data')
